articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Kim Song Gyu
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Kim Song Gyu
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a wreath to the bier of the late Kim Song Gyu, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea who is alternate member of the C.C., the WPK and deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Thursday, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Kim Song Gyu Passes Away
articles.content:
Kim Song Gyu Passes Away
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Song Gyu, alternate member of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and department director of the WPK Central Committee, died of lung cancer on August 24 at the age of 77.
					 The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly jointly issued an obituary of him on the same day.
					
					 According to the obituary, born into a poor peasant's family during the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule, he grew up to be an able official under the care of President Kim Il Sung after the country's liberation. He devotedly worked for the party and the revolution.
					
					 In the period of the Fatherland Liberation War he bravely fought with arms in his hand for the victory of war. Holding important post of the People's Army for years, he worked hard to develop the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK into the matchless revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 During the Arduous March, the forced march, he, working as a commanding officer of the large combined unit of the KPA in the central sector of the front, contributed to defending the outposts of the country as firm as an iron wall and firmly protecting Korean-style socialism true to the Songun leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Holding a responsible post of the Party Central Committee in recent years, he worked heart and soul to increase the combat capacity of the militia forces and firmly establish the all-people and nationwide defence system.
					
					 He received many state citations including Kim Il Sung Order and the title of labor hero for the feats he performed on behalf of the country and the revolution.

articles.title: Meetings of City and County Party Delegates Held
articles.content:
Meetings of City and County Party Delegates Held
Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- Meetings of the city (district) and county party delegates were held recently on the threshold of the conference of the Workers' Party of Korea, according to Rodong Sinmun dated August 26.
					Attending there were delegates elected at party organizations of units at all levels including organs, enterprises and cooperative farms belonging to relevant party committees.
					
					The meetings were unanimous in saying that the WPK conference to be held this significant year marking the 65th birthday of the glorious WPK will be a significant conference which will be a landmark of an epochal turn in strengthening the Party and a great jubilee of great significance in ushering in a new surge in the revolution and construction under the uplifted banner of Songun.
					
					They referred to the fact that General Secretary Kim Jong Il has performed undying feats to shine long in the history of the country by leading the Party and the revolution for a long period.
					
					They noted that Kim Jong Il has devoted his all to the triumphant advance of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the eternal prosperity of Kim Il Sung's Korea.
					
					They stressed that Kim Jong Il provided a sure guarantee for the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche by strengthening the WPK into a powerful staff of the revolution in which unitary idea and leadership are fully ensured under the banner of modeling the whole Party on the Juche idea and a genuine mother's party which is leading the destiny and future of the people, fully responsible for them.
					
					They pointed to the distinguished feats he has performed by unrolling the original Songun politics and training the People's Army into an invincible revolutionary army capable of beating back any formidable enemy at a single stroke and turning the socialist country into an impregnable fortress, thus making it possible to firmly protect the dignity of Kim Il Sung's nation and the prosperity of the generations to come.
					
					They pointed out that thanks to the noble personality of Kim Jong Il as a great man and his lofty benevolent politics the army and people of the DPRK are united closer as an invincible harmonious whole in which they share intention and destiny with each other. 
					
					They noted that a grand blueprint for the nation's prosperity was unrolled and the revolutionary soldier spirit and the Kanggye spirit were given full play to make the brilliant history of a great revolutionary surge shine century after century, cause signal events of bringing earlier the day of appearance of a thriving nation to take place in every part of the country and effect new leap forward and innovations one after another in every unit and at each post thanks to the forced march made by Kim Jong Il for indefatigable field guidance with superhuman will, inexhaustible energy and ardent love for the people.
					
					The meetings elected delegates to the provincial (municipal) party meetings of delegates.
					
					Those elected at the meetings were the officials and party members who distinguished themselves in implementing the Party's line and policies in the spirit of defending the leader with their lives and implementing the leader's instructions, remaining loyal to the Songun revolutionary leadership of
						 Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Start of Leadership at Kim Il Sung Univ. Marked
articles.content:
Start of Leadership at Kim Il Sung Univ. Marked
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- A national seminar was held at the Peopleâ€™s Palace of Culture on Thursday to mark the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of undying leadership at Kim Il Sung University.
					 Present there were Choe Hui Jong, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea,  Kim Yong Jin, chairman of the Education Commission, officials of party and administration bodies and officials of scientific, educational and party cadre-training institutions and others.
					
					 The seminar heard six papers explaining and proving the revolutionary exploits Kim Jong Il performed in the historic days of his revolutionary activities at the university, their greatness and others.
					
					 Speakers referred to the immortal exploits he performed by laying an ideological foundation of single-minded unity centered on the leader and providing a sure guarantee for developing the WPK into an eternal party of the leader.
					
					 Kim Jong Il started his Songun revolutionary leadership by giving historic field guidance to the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division on August 25, Juche 49 (1960), they noted, adding that in his days at Kim Il Sung University he laid a solid ideological and theoretical foundation for formulating and systematizing the Songun politics as a unique political mode.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 As early as his days at Kim Il Sung University Kim Jong Il made sure that a new turn was brought about in the economic work and the drive to improve the standard of people's living and glorified the university as the highest seat of the Juche-based education.
					
					Recalling that thanks to the indefatigable efforts of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu the university has developed into the nation's centre for training native cadres and a prestigious university, they underscored the need to firmly preserve and carry forward the immortal revolutionary exploits of
						 Kim Jong Il recorded in the history of the university in the future, too.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Arranges Reception
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Arranges Reception
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Foreign Ministry arranged a reception on Thursday to mark the 50th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Cuba.
					 Present there on invitation were Jose Manuel Galego Montano, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, and the staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun and officials of the ministry were present.
					
					 Pak said in his speech at the reception that the DPRK and Cuba have steadily boosted the friendly and cooperative relations in the joint struggle to frustrate the vicious moves of the imperialists for aggression, intervention and blockade and hold aloft the banner of socialism for the last 50 years since the establishment of the diplomatic ties.
					
					 He referred to the fact that Fidel Castro Ruz is extending firm support to the Korean revolutionary cause with an invariable principle and obligation, paying deep attention to the situation of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 He stressed that the Korean people would as ever extend invariable support and solidarity to the just struggle of the Cuban people to defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country and the gains of socialism.
					
					 The Cuban ambassador in his speech referred to the fact that the two countries have supported and cooperated with each other in the joint struggle to defend their independence and sovereignty and socialism.
					
					 He stressed that the special friendly relations between the two countries have developed under the deep care of Raul Castro Ruz, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, and Kim Jong Il, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The party, government and people of Cuba will extend invariable support and solidarity to the fraternal party, government and people of the DPRK, he said, expressing hope that the Korean people would attain all their goals and new success would be made in the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Visits Martyrs Cemetery
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Visits Martyrs Cemetery
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Shenyang Military Area of the Chinese People's Liberation Army headed by Lieut. General Zhang Youxia, commander of the area, visited the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and the Friendship Tower on Thursday. 
					 The members of the delegation placed a wreath before the cemetery and observed a moment's silence in memory of the revolutionary martyrs who dedicated their lives to the country's liberation, socialist construction and the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche. 
					
					 They also laid bouquets before the bust of anti-Japanese heroine     Kim Jong Suk and paid tribute to her. 
					
					 Then they laid a wreath before the tower and observed a moment's silence in the memory of the fallen fighters of the Chinese People's Volunteers who bravely fought in the Korean War against the imperialist allied forces. 
					
					 Meanwhile, a wreath was placed before the tower in the name of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces on the same day.

articles.title: Flood Damage Serious in Sinuiju City, Uiju County
articles.content:
Flood Damage Serious in Sinuiju City, Uiju County
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- Torrential rains and floods have inflicted a serious damage on Sinuiju City and Uiju County, North Phyongan Province.
					 Rivers have overflowed by unprecedented downpours of rain that fell on the northeastern area of China on the August 19 and 20 and heavy rains on the area around Lake Suphung of Korea from August 21 to lash the city and county. 
					
					 According to information available for a relevant organ, more than 7,100 dwelling blocks for 7,750 families have been totally or partially destroyed or submerged.
					
					 An estimated 7,200 hectares of farmlands have been flooded, buried or washed away and more than 300 production-related and public buildings, 400 meters of bridges, 7,700 cubic meters of railroad, many structures, vehicles, water pumps and electromotors damaged.
					
					 Many pieces of power transmission equipment have also been lost.
					
					 The government is buckling down to flood recovery, stabilizing the life of the affected people.

articles.title: Angling Contest Held
articles.content:
Angling Contest Held
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- The 9th National Angling Contest was held on the River Taedong in Pyongyang on Thursday under the sponsorship of the Korean Association of Anglers. 
					 According to Han Tong Man, secretary general of the association, some 60 anglers selected from all provinces participated in the contest.
					
					 Each contestant was allowed to use four sorts of angling tackles, including fishhook with a rod and a line and boulter.
					
					 The contest was watched by many spectators.
					
					 Pak Mun Sik, a 45-year-old member of the Association of Anglers in Taedonggang District, Pyongyang, finished first in the contest.
					
					 After the contest he told KCNA that he was very happy to win the contest. 
					
					 The contest gives a glimpse of citizens' leisure activities and the natural environment of the river preserved well thanks to the government's environmental protection policy, he said, adding:
					
					 The good ecological environment of the river provides excellent conditions for freshwater fishes to multiply themselves.
					
					 An exhibition of angling devices was also held on the same day.

articles.title: Chinese Sacrifices Himself to Save Korean Girls
articles.content:
Chinese Sacrifices Himself to Save Korean Girls
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- Chinese businessman Zhang Jingrong who was working in the DPRK sacrificed himself recently to save girls of the DPRK from the jaw of death in the waters off Rason City.
					 Zhang, while taking a stroll on the seaside on Aug. 15, found three girls being swept away by the waves rising all of a sudden from the waters where they were swimming.
					
					 In a minute, the girls were 60m off the shore and were crying out for help, all of them taking hold on a float.
					
					 Zhang together with Yuan Xingwang, his colleague, jumped into the rough sea at the risk of their lives and made desperate efforts to push them to the shore, braving rising waves and strong wind.
					
					 Zhang, very exhausted, asked his colleague to save the girls at any cost and pushed them to the shore as far as he could before being swept again by the rising waves.
					
					 The girls were rescued but he could not rise to the surface again.
					
					 His admirable deed clearly shows how deep the fraternity between the peoples of the DPRK and China is and how beautiful and noble the DPRK-China friendship steadily growing stronger generation after generation is.

articles.title: Koguryo's Chomsongdae Discovered in Mt. Taesong Area
articles.content:
Koguryo's Chomsongdae Discovered in Mt. Taesong Area
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- A ruined Chomsongdae (astronomical observatory) discovered recently in Anhak-dong, Taesong District, Pyongyang has been proved to be built in the period of Koguryo.
					 It covers about 380 square meters. Its upper part was destroyed so much that its original shape is unimaginable, but the lower part still remains almost intact.
					
					 It consists of mainly two structures -- a quadrilateral structure and a heptangular subsidiary structure surrounding it.
					
					 From the archaeological point of view the latter's platform was apparently some 20 meters in diameter and the former was a column-shaped vacant stone structure. The Chomsongdae built with trimmed granite stones is little different from that in Kyongju in shape.
					
					 Relics unearthed in the site are similar to those in Taesongsan Fort and the ruined Anhak Royal Palace in color, quality and pattern. The fact shows the Chomsongdae in the Mt. Taesong area existed in the same period with the fort and palace.
					
					According to the radiocarbon dating of charcoal pieces from the quadrilateral structure, the Chomsongdae was built 1 500-1 600 years ago. 
					
					 It goes to tell the Chomsongdae was constructed when the Anhak Royal Palace was built after Koguryo transferred its capital to Pyongyang in 427.
					
					 The discovery of the Chomsongdae, which had been known only by historical records, proves again that Pyongyang is a time-honored city and a cultural hub of the nation boasting of fifty centuries.

articles.title: Pothonggang Shop Full of Customers
articles.content:
Pothonggang Shop Full of Customers
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- The Pothonggang Shop located nearby the picturesque Pothong River in Pyongyang is always crowded with customers.
					 On the first floor the shop has of late opened the sale of evaporated apple pieces produced by the Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm.
					
					 The tasty apple pieces are in good demand.
					
					 Such fruits as apple, pear, grapes, peach and plum are also on sale on the first floor. 
					
					 On the second floor the shop sells duck, goose and quail meat, each package containing 1-3 kilograms.
					
					 Different kinds of sausages, processed pig stomach, liver and hoof, and such pickles as radish, garlic and hot pepper are also available on the floor.    
					
					 The shop was visited by General Secretary Kim Jong Il in August last year.

articles.title: Cause of National Reunification Sure to Be Realized
articles.content:
Cause of National Reunification Sure to Be Realized
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- The vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) issued a statement on August 25, the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 August 25, Juche 49 (1960), when Kim Jong Il visited the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army was brilliantly recorded in the history of the Korean nation as a historical day that declared the successful accession to the revolutionary cause of Songun which was pioneered on Mt. Paektu, the statement noted, and said:
					
					 The 50-year long history of Kim Jong Il's Songun revolutionary leadership is recorded as the sacred course in which he has defended and comprehensively developed in depth the Songun idea and exploits of President Kim Il Sung and as the annals of victory and glory in which he has strengthened the KPA into invincible revolutionary armed forces to provide a strong militant guarantee for defending the destiny of the nation and made a grandiose new history of building a rich and powerful country.
					
					 In particular, Kim Jong Il formulated the Songun politics as the main political mode of socialism after penetrating into the prevailed situation and the inevitable requirements of the developing revolution in the 1990s and put on a new higher stage the revolutionary cause of Songun by fully realizing the politics in all fields of the revolution and construction.
					
					 Thanks to Kim Jong Il, greatest-ever commander, and the invincible Songun politics, the cause of national reunification is sure to emerge victorious and the desire of the Koreans to live in a new reunified country free from foreign forces will be certainly realized.
					
					 The vanguard fighters of the AINDF, together with the people from all walks of life desirous of national independence and reunification, will more valiantly struggle, full of confidence in sure victory and optimism, to resolutely smash the moves of the separatist forces at home and abroad and build a reunified thriving nation.

articles.title: Halt to US-S. Korean Military Exercises Demanded
articles.content:
Halt to US-S. Korean Military Exercises Demanded
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Switzerland issued a joint statement on August 15 demanding a halt to the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises.
					 Accusing the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces of having staged joint military exercises one after another recently, the statement held that these war maneuvers were aimed to round off a criminal offensive scenario to stifle the DPRK, a sovereign state and member nation of the UN.
					
					 The Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il serves as an all-powerful treasured sword which helped have access to nuclear deterrent for providing a sure guarantee for the sovereignty of the DPRK and peace on the Korean Peninsula, the statement noted, warning that the reckless acts of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet clique would end up meeting a miserable end.
					
					 The organizations strongly denounce the criminal and aggressive Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises, the statement noted, declaring they would join in the world-wide protest action calling for its stop.
					
					 Extending solidarity to the DPRK and supporting all the measures taken by it to defend the sovereignty, the statement urged the U.S. imperialists to stop the moves to ignite a war against the DPRK.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Czech and Moravia issued a statement on August 18 in protest against the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces' war exercises.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Exploits Lauded
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Exploits Lauded
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- Hasanul Huq Inu, chairman of the Central Executive Committee of the Bangladesh National Socialist Party, issued a statement on August 19 to mark the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The statement said that the Songun revolutionary leadership of President Kim Il Sung is successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Il, adding that his start of the Songun revolutionary leadership was a noteworthy event that opened up a bright prospect for achieving a shining victory of the Korean revolution and the global cause of independence. 
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea has wisely led the whole army and all the people to the victory of socialism, frustrating the moves of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK with the might of Songun under the tested leadership of Kim Jong Il, the statement noted. 
					
					 The statement expressed belief that the WPK, the army and the people in the DPRK would certainly emerge victorious in the struggle to defend the socialist country and build a reunified thriving nation under the banner of Songun.

articles.title: Anniversary of Songun Leadership Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Songun Leadership Marked
Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- Meetings, seminars, lectures, ceremonies of opening book and photo exhibition week and film shows were held in the UK, Ethiopia, Uganda and Indonesia and by the Secretariat of the Pan-African Movement between August 12 and 19 to mark the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Displayed in their venues were books and photos showing the Songun leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 The chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy said at a meeting that the DPRK has turned into a socialist state, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence, always emerging victorious in the acute struggle against imperialism. 
					
					 The secretary general of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea noted at the seminar that the recent shining successes made in the DPRK go to clearly prove the Songun leadership feats of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The chairman of the Kampala City Committee of the Uganda National Resistance Movement said in a lecture that the Songun leadership provided by Kim Jong Il serves as a fundamental factor of enabling the DPRK to defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country and emerge victorious in the stand-off with the U.S. 
					
					 The chairman of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia stressed at a film show that thanks to the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il the DPRK has turned into a military power which no formidable enemy dares attack and that the Korean people will always triumph under his Songun leadership. 
					
					 Appreciated at the film shows were "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation", "Reply of Korea" and other Korean films.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige la Fabrica de Elaboracion de Cereales
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige la Fabrica de Elaboracion de Cereales 
Pyongyang, 26 de agosto (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Fabrica de Elaboracion de Cereales de Pyongyang modernizada magnificamente conforme a la demanda de la epoca de IT.
					Tras escuchar explicaciones ante el plano de la fabrica, el Dirigente recorrio los procesos de produccion de los confites, dotados de los equipos nacionales segun la tecnologia CNC al estilo coreano, la exhibicion de los productos y otros lugares cerciorandose en detalles del estado de modernizacion, equipos tecnicos y produccion.
					
					Evaluo altamente los meritos de constructores y voluntarios mostrandose muy satisfecho de la aplicacion de CNC en la fabrica que al automatizar todos los procesos productivos como la introduccion de materias primas hasta el embalaje de los productos, permitio aumentar bruscamente la produccion y garantizar en alto nivel la cultura higienica y de produccion.
					
					El termino exitoso en unos meses de la renovacion tecnologica de la fabrica es un milagro, subrayo el Dirigente y anadio que esta orgullosa realidad demuestra que cuando nuestros funcionarios se apoyan firmemente en la ciencia y la tecnica trabajando con el calido amor y abnegacion por el pueblo, pueden producir en un corto plazo un cambio trascendental en la mejora de la vida alimentaria de nuestro pueblo.
					
					Expreso agradecimiento a las empresas relacionadas y a los profesores e investigadores de las universidades y las entidades de investigacion, inclusive la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, que contribuyeron mucho a la modernizacion de la fabrica.
					
					Destacando que esta empresa tiene mucha importancia para el mejoramiento de la vida alimentaria de los capitalinos, presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en la administracion de ella.
					
					Senalo que ella debe seguir impulsando energicamente la modernizacion y la cientifizacion de los procesos de produccion a base de los exitos ya alcanzados.
					
					Especifico que la importante tarea de la fabrica es aumentar incesantemente la produccion de confites y otros alimentos y mejorar su calidad.
					
					Agrego que para suministrar sabrosos bombones y galletas, es preciso solucionar satisfactoriamente el problema de especias y pigmentos intensificando la investigacion de la rama y mejorar el diseno de articulos.
					
					Subrayo que a fin de normalizar en alto nivel la produccion, hay que tomar minuciosamente la medida para garantizar las materias primas.
					
					Instruyendo concretamente el rumbo y los remedios para ese fin, dispenso el gran favor de solucionar los problemas pendientes que tenia la fabrica.
					
					Encomendo encarecidamente a los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos de la fabrica que cumplan consecuentemente con su honrosa mision y deber, de modo que pueda vivir en abundancia nuestro pueblo, el mejor que vino luchando firmemente siguiendo siempre con fidelidad al partido sin vacilar ante las pruebas de la revolucion.
					
					Le acompanaron el vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, y los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, Hong Sok Hyong y Thae Jong Su.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Kim Song Gyu
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Kim Song Gyu
Pyongyang, 26 de agosto (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il envio el dia 26 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Kim Song Gyu, miembro suplente del Comite Central del PTC, jefe de departamento del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y diputado a la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Fallecio Kim Song Gyu
articles.content:
Fallecio Kim Song Gyu
Pyongyang, 26 de agosto (ATCC) -- El jefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Song Gyu, miembro suplente del CC del PTC y diputado a la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, fallecio el dia 24 a los 77 anos de edad a causa de una enfermedad incurable (cancer pulmonar).
					 Ese dia, se dio a la publicidad la esquela mortuoria a nombre comun del CC del PTC y el Presidium de la APS de la RPDC.
					
					Segun la nota, el nacio en una familia campesina pobre durante el coloniaje japones sobre Corea y despues de la liberacion, crecio como funcionario competente en el regazo del Presidente
						 Kim Il Sung y lucho abnegadamente por el partido y la revolucion.
					
					  Durante la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (1950-1953), combatio valientemente con el arma por la victoria de la guerra y despues trabajo largo tiempo en los importantes puestos del Ejercito Popular de Corea esforzandose ingentemente por desarrollar estas fuerzas armadas revolucionarias en las invencibles del monte Paektu.
					
					Durante la Marcha penosa y la forzada, en pleno acato a la direccion del Songun del Dirigente 
						Kim Jong Il, contribuyo a defender firmemente el frente avanzado de la patria y el socialismo al estilo coreano fungiendo como comandante de la unidad combinada del EPC en el frente central.
					
					  En los ultimos anos, ocupo importante cargo del CC del PTC y trabajo dedicando toda su inteligencia y pasion para consolidar la combatividad de las fuerzas armadas civiles y establecer el solido sistema defensivo de todo el pueblo y todo el pais.
					
					  En reconocimiento a sus meritos realizados por la patria y la revolucion, se le fueron concedidas muchas condecoraciones estatales como la Orden Kim Il Sung y el titulo de Heroe del Trabajo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe telegrama de consuelo de Hu Jintao
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe telegrama de consuelo de Hu Jintao
Pyongyang, 26 de agosto (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio el telegrama de consuelo que le remitiera el dia 24 Hu Jintao, Secretario General del CC del Partido Comunista de China y Presidente de la Republica Popular China.
					 El mensaje sigue:
					
					 Al enterarme de la noticia inesperada de que algunas zonas de su pais sufrieron recientemente las perdidas humanas y materiales por las graves inundaciones, expreso profunda compasion y condolencias a Usted y, por su conducto, al gobierno y al pueblo de Corea.
					
					 Estamos convencidos de que bajo la direccion consistente del camarada Secretario General y el Partido del Trabajo de Corea, los habitantes de zonas damnificadas superaran sin falta los desastres naturales y estabilizaran cuanto antes su vida.

articles.title: Gobierno chino decide donar materiales de socorro a la RPDC
articles.content:
Gobierno chino decide donar materiales de socorro a la RPDC
Pyongyang, 26 de agosto (ATCC) -- El gobierno de la Republica Popular China decidio ofrecer los materiales de socorro urgente en relacion con que recientemente, la ciudad de Sinuiju de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte y otras partes de Corea sufrieron danos por la inundacion.
					 Esta medida de la parte china estimulara la lucha del pueblo coreano por reparar cuanto antes los danos por la inundacion y acelerar con dinamismo la construccion de una gran potencia prospera.

articles.title: Tienen lugar reuniones de delegados urbanos y distritales del partido
articles.content:
Tienen lugar reuniones de delegados urbanos y distritales del partido
Pyongyang, 26 de agosto (ATCC) -- Segun el diario Rodong Sinmun fechado 26, en visperas de la conferencia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, tuvieron lugar recientemente las reuniones de los delegados urbanos (municipales) y distritales del partido.
					 En las ocasiones estuvieron presentes los delegados seleccionados en las organizaciones del partido de diversas unidades a todos los niveles como organos, empresas y granjas cooperativas adscritos a los respectivos comites del partido.
					
					 Los usuarios de la palabra coincidieron en que la conferencia del PTC, que sesiona en este ano significativo del 65o aniversario de la fundacion de este partido glorioso, es el conclave de mucho significado que marcara un hito del cambio trascendental en el fortalecimiento del partido, y el evento jubiloso de capital importancia para abrir el nuevo periodo de ascenso en la revolucion y la construccion bajo la bandera del Songun.
					
					Subrayaron que al conducir al frente el partido y la revolucion durante largo tiempo, el DirigenteKim Jong Il realizo hazanas inmortales que brillaran eternamente en los anales de la patria.
					
					  Senalaron que el Dirigente vino dedicando todo lo suyo para el avance victorioso de la causa revolucionaria del Juche y la prosperidad infinita de la Corea de Kim Il Sung.
					
					  Ratificaron que al desarrollar, segun la bandera de conversion de todo el partido segun la idea Juche, como poderoso Estado Mayor de la revolucion, que mantiene con firmeza la idea y direccion unicas, y verdadero partido madre que se responsabiliza y conduce el destino y el futuro del pueblo, el Dirigente preparo la garantia principal del cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					  Se refirieron a las proezas extraordinarias del Dirigente quien segun su original politica de Songun, formo al ejercito popular como el invencible y revolucionario capaz de derrotar de un solo golpe a cualquier enemigo poderoso y convirtio la patria socialista en la fortaleza inexpugnable, de manera que fueran aseguradas la dignidad de la nacion de Kim Il Sung y la prosperidad de todas las generaciones venideras.
					
					  Los nobles rasgos y la politica de beneficios populares del Dirigente son el factor que permite al partido, el ejercito y el pueblo coreanos unirse cada vez mas firmemente como ente indestructible en que comparten el mismo proposito y el mismo destino, indicaron.
					
					  En el trayecto de la marcha forzada de la incansable direccion sobre el terreno que emprendio el Dirigente con su voluntad sobrehumana, entusiasmo inagotable y amor ardiente por el pueblo, se trazo el magno proyecto de la prosperidad nacional, apuntaron.
					
					Continuaron que al manifestarse plenamente el espiritu revolucionario de los militares y el de Kanggye, se pudo dar continuidad siglo tras siglo a la historia gloriosa de gran auge revolucionario, se registran por doquier eventos maravillosos anunciadores del acercamiento de la gran potencia prospera y se crean en todas las unidades y puestos nuevos saltos e innovaciones.
					
					  En las reuniones hubo las elecciones de los delegados a ser enviados a las reuniones de los delegados provinciales (o de las ciudades de jurisdiccion central) del partido.
					
					  Fueron electos los funcionarios y los militantes del partido que resultaron ejemplares en apoyar con fidelidad la guia del Dirigente sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun y en ejecutar la linea y la politica del partido con la disposicion de defender al lider a costa de la vida y materializar de igual manera las orientaciones del partido.
